summary: Request to add support for attaching priority to workflows and activities in the PHP SDK, following the feature specification defined in the features repository.
userImpact: Users cannot currently prioritize workflows and activities, limiting their ability to control execution order and resource allocation in time-sensitive applications.
proposedFix: Implement priority annotation support for workflows and activities as specified in the features repository issue #593.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support priority annotations on workflows and activities.
keyQuote: Add support for attaching priority to workflows/activities
